attributes.action: Make all CSA assessments for payment based on ability to pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There must be a system put in place to calculate a persons ability to pay CSA demands based on liabilities not just income. A co-operative parent who maintains strong links with his/her children and already demonstrates financial commitment (not just hard cash) but by way of housing, travel, food, clothing, entertainment, etc etc, must has this taken into account.
The system is completely unfair and causes more distress and division within already fractured families - at no point does it support children, as the name would imply.
